verses.verse: Oh come,<WH3212> let<WH7442>'s sing to Yahweh.<WH3068> Let<WH7321>'s shout aloud to the rock<WH6697> of our salvation!<WH3468>
Let<WH6923>'s come before his presence<WH6440> with thanksgiving.<WH8426> Let<WH7321>'s extol him with songs!<WH2158>
For Yahweh<WH3068> is a great<WH1419> God,<WH410> a great<WH1419> King<WH4428> above all gods.<WH410>
In his hand<WH3027> are the deep places<WH4278> of the earth.<WH776> The heights<WH8443> of the mountains are also his.<WH2022>
The sea<WH3220> is his,<WH6213> and he made it.<WH3027> His hands formed<WH3335> the dry land.<WH3006>
Oh come,<WH935> let<WH7812>'s worship and bow down.<WH3766> Let<WH1288>'s kneel before<WH6440> Yahweh,<WH3068> our Maker,<WH6213>
for he is our God.<WH430> We are the people<WH5971> of his pasture,<WH4830> and the sheep<WH6629> in his care.<WH3027> Today,<WH3117> oh that you would hear<WH8085> his voice!<WH6963>
Don't<WH7185> harden your heart,<WH3824> as at Meribah,<WH4808> as in the day<WH3117> of Massah<WH4531> in the wilderness,<WH4057>
when your fathers<WH1> tempted<WH5254> me,<WH974> tested me,<WH7200> and saw my work.<WH6467>

Forty<WH705> long years<WH8141> I was grieved<WH6962> with that generation,<WH1755> and said,<WH559> "It is a people<WH5971> that errs<WH8582> in their heart.<WH3824> They have not known<WH3045> my ways.<WH1870>"
Therefore I swore<WH7650> in my wrath,<WH639> "They won't<WH935> enter into my rest.<WH4496>"
